events.message: I received the wrong item and would like to return it for a full refund as soon as possible.
System has categorised the customer's issue under Refund based on keywords related to returning items and requesting money back.
The case was assigned to agent Sarah T., who specializes in processing refunds and returns, to ensure a timely resolution.
Hello, thank you for contacting us. I'm sorry to hear you received the wrong item. I'm here to help you with your refund request.
Can you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received? This will help us to verify the issue quickly.
Here is my order number 12345678 and the photo attached shows the item I received is different from what I ordered.
Thank you for the details. We will arrange for a free return shipping label and process a full refund once we receive the incorrect item back.
That sounds great, thank you. I appreciate the quick response and help with this return.
We have received the returned item and issued your refund to the original payment method. Please allow 3-5 business days to reflect on your account.
Just following up to ensure your refund has been received and to check if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Since your refund has been processed and you have no further questions, we are closing this case. Thank you for choosing our service.
